sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { UserContext } from '../contexts/User'; import '../Styles/BannerV4.css' function CheckoutBody(props) { const { userInfo } = useContext(UserContext); const [nameInput, setNameInput] = useState("") const [emailInput, setEmailInput] = useState("") const [phoneInput, setPhoneInput] = useState("") const [provinceId, setProvinceId] = useState("") const [userTinh, setUserTinh] = useState(null) const [userHuyen, setUserHuyen] = useState(null) useEffect(()=>{ setNameInput(userInfo.userName) setEmailInput(userInfo.userEmail) setPhoneInput(userInfo.userPhone) if (userInfo.userTinh !== "") { tinh.filter((item)=>{ if (userInfo.userTinh === item.name) { setProvinceId(item.id) } }) setUserTinh(userInfo.userTinh) } if (userInfo.userHuyen !== "") { setUserHuyen(userInfo.userHuyen) } },[userInfo]) return(
Billing Details
Name { setNameInput(event.target.value) }} >
Phone number { setPhoneInput(event.target.value) }} >
Email { setEmailInput(event.target.value) }} >
Province
Distric
Address
Your order
Name
Phone number
Province
Distric
Address
) } export default CheckoutBody;
